name: jogl

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
JOGL provides full access to the APIs in the OpenGL specification as
well as nearly all vendor extensions.

dependencies.name: ant
dependencies.description:
Apache Ant is a Java library and command-line tool whose mission is to
drive processes described in build files as targets and extension points
dependent upon each other

dependencies.name: gl
dependencies.description: Shim package for the GLX library.

dependencies.name: glu
dependencies.description: This package provides the Mesa OpenGL Utility library.

dependencies.name: gluegen
dependencies.description:
GlueGen is a tool which automatically generates the Java and JNI code
necessary to call C libraries.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The IcedTea project provides a harness to build the source code from
https://openjdk.java.net/ using Free Software build tools and adds a
number of key features to the upstream OpenJDK codebase. IcedTea
requires an existing IcedTea or OpenJDK install to build.

dependencies.name: libxcursor
dependencies.description: libXcursor - X Window System Cursor management library.

dependent_to.name: octa
dependent_to.description: OCTA is an integrated simulation system for soft materials.
